column2:
a <- QSummary %>% filter(site == "Moose") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x=date, y=Q..L.s., color = site), size=3) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#A6761D")) +
  theme_classic() +
  ggtitle("Moose")
a

b <- QSummary %>% filter(site == "French") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x=date, y=Q..L.s., color = site), size=3) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#FF7F00")) +
  theme_classic() +
  ggtitle("French")
b
